author: Staff Reporter
Karthik Madhavan
text:
RELIGION

Arulmigu Rathina Vinayagar Thirukoil: Kruthigai puja, 8.30 a.m.

Raj Vidya Kender: Discourse, Inner Peace, 11 a.m.

Yagoda Satsanga Dhyana Kendra: Satsanga, teachings of Paramahamsa Yogananda, Kendra premises, 54, Uppilipalayam, 10.30 a.m.

GENERAL

India Book of Records and Asia Book of Records: World record attempt, Race Course Road, 11 a.m.

Ciska Youth Social Trust: Polling awareness rally, Government Polytechnic College, 6.30 a.m.

The Philatelists’ Coimbatore: Monthly meeting, Coimbatore Head Post Office, 11.30 a.m.

Dravidar Viduthalai Kazhagam: Book release, Annamalai Hall, 9.30 a.m.

The Coimbatore District Textile Workers’ Union: NG Ramasamy 105th birth anniversary celebrations, NGR Mahal, 11 a.m.

Dr. R.V. Arts and Science College, Karamadai: Free medical camp,

9.30 a.m.

Ortho One: Shoulder rehab course,

9 a.m.

Coimbatore Malayali Suhrudvedi: Felicitation to Vijayakumar Kunissery, CMS Auditorium, 5.30 p.m.

Coimbatore ACME Round Table 133: Fund raiser programme, PSGIMS&R grounds, 6 a.m.

All India Central Council of Trade Unions: 10th anniversary function, Sri Sri Anandam Wedding Hall, K. Vadamadurai, 10 a.m.
title: COIMBATORE TODAY
